extendedInfo.description: /!\ ROOT REQUIRED *JB support*/!\Voltage Control Extreme available!CPU tweaking made easy and simple.Increased battery life and higher device performance.Easy and intuitive overclocking and undervolting. This application allows you to control advanced features of overclocking kernels, you can change the voltage applied and select frequencies you want to use.Voltage Control Extreme (developer name sulph8), features include:Â - Support more than one profile- CPU history display- overvolting support (+50mV and 1500mV limit)Â - undervolting up to -250mV (lite version limited to -200mV)Devices supported (with proper kernels!):Galaxy S3 (GT-i9300)Galaxy S2 (GT-i9100)Infuse 4G (SGH-i997)Galaxy S (GT-i9000(m))Captivate (SGH-897)Vibrant	(SGH-T959)Fascinate (SCH-I500)Epic 4G (SGH-D700)Galaxy Tab (P1000)Nexus S,and many, many more!Supported features may vary on depending on model and kernel.Voltage Control	works with Eclair, Froyo and Gingerbread, Honeycomb, ICS, JB ROMs, no matter if STOCK or CM7/CM9/AOKP/MIUI.This is a lite version.It supports:- CPU overclock / underclock- set CPU governor- changing of I/O Scheduler- selection of maximum OC frequency- selection if minimum frequency- enabling/disabling of particular frequencies (on supported kernels!) - changing voltage per frequency- You can create up to two switchable profiles- Widget with profile switcher and app launcher (passive)- it can create CWM flashable boot settings remover, to save the day.After you install the key Extreme features will be unlocked.Consider it rather *donate version* because these features are NOT GUARANTEED TO WORK.USE THIS APPLICATION ON YOUR OWN RISKI recommend app nitrality, which I develop with insanity ROM maker nitr8!Similar CPU speed setting apps: SetCPU, OverclockWidget, PimpMyCPU, CPU Tuner, Milestone Overclock, CPU Master, No-frills CPU Control

reviews.title: Best hands down ^_^
reviews.comment: This app has been my favorite app overall in the whole market! I love it and its a must have in all my devices. Crashes here and there but not so much where it bothers me. Running smoothly on sgs2 rooted and flashed with Jedi Mind Trick . I love my GS2 now . Thank you developer
reviews.author: Angel Vargas

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Quick install with a lot of info during the 1st run. works fine on rooted Motorola x910 with 4.0.4 , Quadrrant results :  Before VC: total of 2600  -+  After VC : Total of 3200-+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Does what it needs to do very well, clear interface, lots of tools. (Samsung Vibrant)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Improved my bat life quite a lot using this tool checkrom v6 sgs2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shocking performance improvement
reviews.comment: My phone previously was laggy and slow even with 1.2 dual core and 1gb ram. Seriously for a mobile os with those specs to be that slow: total crap. But with this app my phone now is smooth as butter.
reviews.author: Chris Knutson

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: Took my Vibrant from lasting from 9 hr\'s at 40% to 9 hr\'s to 65% or better. Truly awesome. How androids batteries should last. I now can compete and outlast my buds with iPhones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Battery Saver
reviews.comment: I don\'t write that many reviews unless the app is descent. I have used many CPU saver apps and kept replacing one over the other as it gets better and better. This by far is the best at this point. After 1 hour, barely 1% battery consumption on idle. With others CPU apps, after 1 hour, 2-4% battery consumption on idle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Not supported voltage controls on DROID RAZR unfortunately :( Motorola\'s fault though, just thought I\'d let it known (Running eclipse 1.3 rom)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: as said, works very well for samsung galaxy ii. together with ressurection rom, my phone is now running for 3 days and it is only at 40%. just wonderful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S
reviews.comment: Hello all(those who are rating this app less than 4 stars), this is a tremendous app. You should read description before installing.  It is clearly mentioned 2 per requisites.  1. Your phone should be rooted. 2. You should have kernel which supports over clocking.   Peace....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hope
reviews.comment: Try if nice.if this good I give you more stars.
reviews.author: Jose Tinaytinay

reviews.title: Worthless for me
reviews.comment: Does not do much of any use on a Droid 2 ( a955) kernel version 2.632.9 - gca08d89 & on Gingerbread 2.3.7 .. no voltage adjust present & only allows basic cpu control that I already have.  3 stars because it runs & did not crash phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best!!
reviews.comment: I have installed this app on my sgs3 and it stayed @100 percent charge for...about an hour and a half.. so I put it on my sgs2 as well... exceeded my hopes!!
reviews.author: Matt E

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'m glad to say that voltage control is functional on jb 4.2.1 and working on galaxy nexus. To the reviewers that rate poorly, does your kernel support Over clocking and/or under volting?if not then all voltage control will do is basic CPU control...
reviews.author: \303\206onic Flavas

reviews.title: Fine on the Note
reviews.comment: Works on Galaxy Note running CM9 Nightlies, although with no GPU control. Useful thing to have, especially since SetCpu causes wakelocks (sometimes).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Truly remarkable!!!!
reviews.comment: I have tried different kernels and overclocking and underclocking apps. This app truly is so powerful given you have installed the right kernel and siyah is the one I have. Just can\'t figure out why some users give low rating, I suggest u provide ur device with the right configuration before trying this one. You should also try the dev\'s other apps. This is a keeper. Mindblowing!!! Thumbs up 4 u dev! Keep up d good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: Used to be great. Incredibly laggy on ATT Note 2 at 1.9Ghz.
reviews.author: Niral Ramesh

reviews.title: Dafuq!
reviews.comment: This is not modified cpu voltage but control cpu speed. Dafuq!!!....useless..
reviews.author: Odin Dodolz

reviews.title: Keepin It Simple<3!
reviews.comment: Works great on my Samsung Mesmerize(SCH-I500) with KGB Kernel and TSM Resurrection 1.2 rom. Works perfectly without bloat and doesnt try to be an all in one app which I love so dont change a thang, its beautiful as is. Thanks! ;)
reviews.author: DJ Belail

reviews.title: Complete and for free
reviews.comment: It does nearly the same things of SetCPU but for free. 4 stars because it allows only steps of 25mV while my kernel has steps of 20mV, and so it will miss some voltages. That should be adjusted and I will give 5 stars.  BTW do not rate it poorly if your phone isn\'t rooted and/or you don\'t have a custom kernel that supports the dynamic under volting. These tools are graphical user interfaces to modify kernel\'s system files. If it doesn\'t work it\'s because your kernel is crap, not the application!!
reviews.author: A Google User
